Title: A Slight at the Opera
Plot: When the lead in the school's production of "Phantom of the Opera" gets sick, Manny is willing to do anything to land the lead; Phil and Jay wind up in a golf-off with Mitch and Pepper; Gloria and Alex visit a psychic.
GuestStars: Piper Mackenzie Harris, Molly Morgen Lamont, Norma Maldonado
